DOC.brief_summary: Assessment efficacy vardenafil treatment subject symptomatic Benign Prostatic Hyperplasia.The purpose study find whether vardenafil improve low urinary tract symptom benign prostatic hyperplasia 8 week daily administration 10 mg BID .
DOC.brief_title: Assessment Efficacy Vardenafil Treatment Subjects With Symptomatic Benign Prostatic Hyperplasia
DOC.criteria: Males 45 64 year age Lower urinary tract symptom > 6 month International Prostate Symptom Score > 12 Prostate Specific Antigen > 3 ng/ml Residual urine volume > 150 History myocardial infarction , stroke lifethreatening arrhythmia within prior 6 month Nitrate use Other exclusion criterion apply acc .
